function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Porous borders contributing to the spread of contagious diseases","Impact":"Increased likelihood of disease transmission and global spread","Mitigation":"Strengthening border control measures and international cooperation","Technologies":"Surveillance systems, border monitoring technology","People":"People living near porous borders, travelers, and international communities","Owner":"Government agencies, international health organizations"},{"Description":"Burden of communicable and non-communicable diseases","Impact":"Overburdened healthcare systems and increased susceptibility to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Investment in healthcare infrastructure and disease prevention programs","Technologies":"Telemedicine, disease monitoring technology","People":"People with existing diseases, healthcare workers","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Poor health literacy and infodemic","Impact":"Misinformation and misunderstanding of disease prevention and treatment","Mitigation":"Health education and promotion of reliable information sources","Technologies":"Health education apps, telehealth platforms","People":"Communities with low health literacy, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Public health organizations, educational institutions"}]}
